personal.name: Akshay Namdeo Adate
personal.title: Senior AI Engineer
personal.bio: Building scalable, cloud-native AI applications with 5+ years of expertise in Node.js, React, Python, and AWS. Passionate about Generative AI, conversational systems, and creating impactful solutions.

about.description: I'm a passionate AI Engineer specializing in Generative AI and full-stack development. With over 5 years of experience, I've been at the forefront of building scalable, cloud-native applications that leverage cutting-edge AI technologies.

highlights.title: Collaborative Leader
highlights.description: Strong believer in teamwork, knowledge sharing, and mentoring the next generation of developers.

highlights.title: Results-Focused
highlights.description: Committed to delivering high-quality solutions that exceed expectations and drive measurable outcomes.
